| HistoryText             = The Rat Pack were a group of looters who were defeated by Captain Marvel.{{r|Captain Marvel #20}} 

They were then taken over by the [[Kl'rt (Earth-616)|Super Skrull]] under the human guise of Joshua Plague. He saved Number 2, Marie Duchailu, who had been known as Madame Menace, acting as the "Crime Queen of New Orleans" from being killed by the [[Maggia (Earth-616)|Maggia]] after being overthrown and Number 3 and 4 from death row. Number 5 was a robot constructed by Super Skrull.{{r|Marvel Chillers #6}} They raided the reservation where  [[William Talltrees (Earth-616)|Red Wolf]]'s tribe lived to steal the ancient artifact called the Soul Catcher. They clashed with [[Greer Grant (Earth-616)|Tigra]] and Red Wolf.{{r|Marvel Chillers #3}}{{r|Marvel Chillers #5|6}} When the Super Skrull revealed his true identity, the Rat Pack members fled from the battle, leaving him behind.{{r|Marvel Chillers #7}}
